channel.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
channel.description: [url=http://forums.facepunchstudios.com/showthread.php?t=660748]This[/url] says what happened. I guess the kid's mom left while he was at school, and never returned.. Rest of the details at the link above. xD

item.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

jme:

The problems I have with my mom are much much worse than this. I wish I had this same problem though it would make everything a whole lot easier.

:o dam

Read full topic
item.source: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him

item.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Ske, post:25, topic:251434”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=331882.msg2592795#msg2592795 date=1229858397]

she fucking left you for some e-bf. Sure as hell shows how much she loves the kid.

she probably went there to meet her “boyfriend” on msn. she stays up until 4am sometimes chatting with him through mics.

Yeah I know!
But if you really love your mother it’s hard to tell her to basicly “fuck off”.

I’ve done it before, it isn’t hard, and I meant it, whether or not you believe I did, I did.
[/quote]
Yeah why not, let’s brag about it!
I told my mom to fuck off too, am i as cool as you now?[/quote]
Actually I meant telling her to “fuck off”, then she leaves forever, and you knew it was gonna happen.

But meh, what are the chances of that?..forget it…

Read full topic

item.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
item.dc:creator: @Ske Ske
item.description:
@Ske wrote:

R.I.P RSC:

If the kids life ain’t ruined, it doesn’t matter that much. His mom wants a new life, so why shouldn’t she have one?

Because by marrying someone and then having a child means you promise to yourself you won’t ever do shit like that.

item.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:16, topic:251434”]Who the fuck meets some random guy on msn named troy and decides to run to denmark to meet and have sex with him

Obviously this is fake, he can easily be living in denmark too, or his mom is just visiting.

Mel, its me mom i just wanted to let u know that im ok i just needed to get away for a while , plz dont get upset with ur brother i want u to be strong for me i had to do this ill call u if u promis me ull be ok , im not gona come home now i have somehting in my mind and wanna do best for me and for u believe me, and let every one else know too i dont wanna call cuz i know how frantic they gona be im traveling all over, talk to u later , love mom

That looks fake as fuck also, considering it’s his mom

There are alot of things that scream fake, but im cba to post.[/quote]
His brother claims she wrote it from her cellphone and my mom writes stuff like that too, just Norwegian sms language.

But, could be fake but can also be real. I read almost all the pages and it was some read

Read full topic

item.title: Kid's Mom Runs Away From Him
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Who the fuck meets some random guy on msn named troy and decides to run to denmark to meet and have sex with him

Obviously this is fake, he can easily be living in denmark too, or his mom is just visiting.

Mel, its me mom i just wanted to let u know that im ok i just needed to get away for a while , plz dont get upset with ur brother i want u to be strong for me i had to do this ill call u if u promis me ull be ok , im not gona come home now i have somehting in my mind and wanna do best for me and for u believe me, and let every one else know too i dont wanna call [b]cuz[/b] i know how frantic [b]they gona be[/b] im traveling all over, talk to u later , love mom
That looks fake as fuck also, considering it's his mom

There are alot of things that scream fake, but im cba to post.

Read full topic
